channel.title: Pensacola Linux User's Group
channel.description: Live information from Pensacola Linux User's Group

item.title: Chinese propaganda
item.description:
Was asked to eyeball a Chinese video clip recently.

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=L_Wu1HlZbBk&feature=youtu.be&t=36s

I think it was designed for in-house propaganda but I noted a fun oddity.  At 1:24, 2:03, 2:22, and 9:31 minutes:seconds into the clip there are brief glimpses of the GLMatrix screensaver which is part of some Linux distributions, notably Ubuntu derivatives.

Not sure if the Chinese are big Linux users or if they just think the screensaver is cool.

sandspur
living and dying in runle...

item.title: Entropy
item.description:
Picked this up at the BBC site.  Comedian Nick Helm won a British award fro best joke of the year:

"I needed a password eight characters long so I picked Snow White and the Seven Dwarves."

sandspur
living and dying in runlevel three

item.title: Now Hiring for Pensacola NAS - Linux Admins, Windows Admins and Oracle DBA
item.description:
We are currently looking for experienced Linux admins, Windows admins and Oracle DBAs.  If any of you guys are looking for work, or can recommend anyone, please let me know!  This would include nights (11pm to 7am) and/or weekend shifts.  Active security clearance and any relevant certifications are preferred!

nick.smith at gmail. com

item.title: Alienate everyone
item.description:
Stumbled across this Linux t-shirt browsing.  Don't think I am brave enough to wear this t-shirt anywhere...

http://www.cafepress.com/+linux_dark_tshirt,48675303?cmp=dac--ta--us--000--00000&utm_source=Tellapart&utm_campaign=retargeting&pid=6673149&utm_medium=display

sandspur
living and dying in runlevel three

item.title: Gnome 3
item.description:
Expecting to see the Gnome 3 desktop when Fedora 15 is released at the end of this month.  Will give it a try then.

I've downloaded Ubuntu 11.04 twice but each time the CHECKSUM failed.  Screenshots look pretty cool.

sandspur
living and dying in runlevel three
